page.title: 18POLICE IN CUMBERNAULD
page.content: A{community policeman}tries to{prevent crimes happening rather than solving crimes after they have happened. They undergo{special training}and{do not {wear uniforms}so that they are more like members of the public. There are two police officers in this area whose job is to work closely with the{local {community.}One of ther duties is to give people advise on making their{ {homes and shops safe}from thieves. Housebreaking is one of the most common crimes in this area. They also spend a lot of time { {visiting primary and secondary}schools in the area to teach young people about the role of the police. Their other main duty is organising activities such as{youth clubs and {discos}in the evening. This is important because many young people who are unemployed may turn to crime.
